messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR GORDON HENDERSON
messages.content:
1. Gordon is a local man 
2. Gordon is different 
3. Gordon is honest

messages.title: 5 MORE YEARS OF GORDON BROWN OR CHANGE WITH THE CONSERVATIVES
messages.content: Vote for change in Sittingbourne & Sheppey on 6th May.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We’re backing the creation of new jobs by stopping Labour’s job tax and taking action to get Britain working again.
David Cameron has promised to stop Labour’s cuts and ensure that spending on the NHS rises every year.
We will create smaller schools and bring back setting by ability to make sure that children are taught in a way that’s right for them.
Families are the bedrock of a strong society and we will reform the welfare system to make sure that families do everything they can to find work.

issues.economy: We’re backing the creation of new jobs by stopping Labour’s job tax and taking action to get Britain working again.
issues.education: We will create smaller schools and bring back setting by ability to make sure that children are taught in a way that’s right for them.
issues.environment: Conservative proposals include working with local schools and residents to run competitions to design a city poster and write a short story based on cleaning up our local environment.
issues.health: David Cameron has promised to stop Labour’s cuts and ensure that spending on the NHS rises every year.
issues.socialWelfare: Families are the bedrock of a strong society and we will reform the welfare system to make sure that families do everything they can to find work.

housing.content: We are blocking Labour’s eco-towns and garden grabs.

politicalExperience.achievements: Gordon Henderson fought the Sittingbourne & Sheppey seat.

contactInformation.address: Halfway Conservative Hall, 34-36 Minster Road, Halfway, Kent, ME12 3JJ
